name: Corgy
text: On Play Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and place up to 2 cards in the trash. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and place up to 2 cards in the trash. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the 'SAMPLE' watermark.
